about: The first season introduces the six main characters: Rachel, Monica, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler, and Ross. Rachel arrives at Central Perk after leaving her fianc√©, Barry, at the altar. She moves into an apartment with her high school friend Monica and takes up a waitressing job at Central Perk. Ross, who has had a crush on Rachel since high school, constantly attempts to declare his feelings for her. However, many obstacles stand in his way, including Rachel dating an Italian neighbour named Paolo, and the fact that he is expecting a baby with his lesbian ex-wife, Carol. She gives birth later in the season and names the child Ben. Joey is a bachelor and struggling actor. Phoebe is working as a masseuse; she is slightly crazy because her mother committed suicide when she was a child. However, the rest of the group loves her regardless. Chandler breaks up with his girlfriend, Janice (Maggie Wheeler), only to find himself reconnecting with her over the course of the series. Near the end of the season, Chandler accidentally reveals that Ross loves Rachel, who then realizes that she feels the same way. The season ends with Rachel waiting at the airport for Ross, who is returning from a trip.

S1E1.title: The One Where Monica Gets a Roommate
S1E1.des: Monica and the gang introduce Rachel to the "real world" after she leaves her fiancé at the altar.

S1E2.title: The One with the Sonogram at the End
S1E2.des: Ross finds out his ex-wife is pregnant. Rachel returns her engagement ring to Barry. Monica becomes stressed when her and Ross's parents come to visit.

S1E3.title: The One with the Thumb
S1E3.des: Monica becomes irritated when everyone likes her new boyfriend more than she does. Chandler resumes his smoking habit. Phoebe is given $7000 when she finds a thumb in a can of soda.

S1E4.title: The One with George Stephanopoulos
S1E4.des: Joey and Chandler take Ross to a hockey game to take his mind off the anniversary of the first time he slept with Carol, while the girls become depressed when they realize they don't have a 'plan'.

S1E5.title: The One with the East German Laundry Detergent
S1E5.des: Eager to spend time with Rachel, Ross pretends his washroom is rat-infested so he can join her at the laundromat. Meanwhile, Joey has Monica pose as his girlfriend, and Chandler struggles to break up with his girlfriend.

S1E6.title: The One with the Butt
S1E6.des: Monica's obsessiveness is put to the test after Rachel cleans the apartment. Joey lands a film role as Al Pacino's butt double. Chandler enjoys a relationship with all of the fun but none of the responsibility.

S1E7.title: The One with the Blackout
S1E7.des: When New York suffers from a blackout, Ross tries to tell Rachel that he likes her, and Chandler gets stuck in an ATM vestibule with a model.

S1E8.title: The One Where Nana Dies Twice
S1E8.des: Monica and Ross mourn the loss of their grandmother. Chandler is shocked to find that people think he is gay.

S1E9.title: The One Where Underdog Gets Away
S1E9.des: The gang's plans for Thanksgiving go awry after they get locked out of Monica and Rachel's apartment.

S1E10.title: The One with the Monkey
S1E10.des: The gang make (and break) a pact not to bring dates to their New Years Eve party. Phoebe starts dating a scientist. Ross compensates for his loneliness by getting a monkey.

S1E11.title: The One with Mrs. Bing
S1E11.des: Chandler's flamboyant romance-novelist mother comes to visit, and Joey catches her kissing Ross. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe fight over a guy in a coma.

S1E12.title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnas
S1E12.des: Rachel and Paolo's relationship hits a snag when he makes a pss at Phoebe. Ross refuses to find out the sex of his baby until it's born. Chandler and Joey go shopping for a new kitchen table.

S1E13.title: The One with the Boobies
S1E13.des: Joey finds out his dad has a mistress. Rachel tries to even the score after Chandler inadvertently catches a glimpse of her breasts. Phoebe dates a shrink who analyzes the gang.

S1E14.title: The One with the Candy Hearts
S1E14.des: As Valentine's Day approaches; Ross and his date end up at the same restaurant as Carol and Susan, Joey inadvertently sets Chandler up on a blind date with Janice, and the girls burn mementos of their old boyfriends.

S1E15.title: The One with the Stoned Guy
S1E15.des: Monica cooks a gourmet meal for a restaurateur who is looking for a new chef, however he arrives at the apartment stoned. Meanwhile, Ross tries to master 'dirty talk'.

S1E16.title: The One with Two Parts: Part 1
S1E16.des: Phoebe feels neglected when Joey falls for her twin sister. Chandler struggles to fire an attractive co-worker. Ross attends Lamaze classes with Carol and Susan.

S1E17.title: The One with Two Parts: Part 2
S1E17.des: Rachel switches identities with Monica so she can use her health insurance. Meanwhile, Ursula continues to come between Phoebe and Joey.

S1E18.title: The One with All the Poker
S1E18.des: As Rachel interviews for a new job, the girls take on the guys in a game of poker.

S1E19.title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
S1E19.des: The gang frantically search for Ross's monkey Marcel after Rachel loses him.

S1E20.title: The One with the Evil Orthodontist
S1E20.des: Rachel and Barry start dating again, despite the fact that he's now engaged to Mindy; Chandler goes nuts when a woman he likes won't return his phone calls.

S1E21.title: The One with the Fake Monica
S1E21.des: Monica befriends the woman who stole her credit card. Ross is forced to give away Marcel. Joey tries to come up with a less ethnic-sounding stage name.

S1E22.title: The One with the Ick Factor
S1E22.des: Monica gets a shock when she finds out her boyfriend is a high school student. Chandler finds out his colleagues don't like him when Phoebe temps as his secretary.

S1E23.title: The One with the Birth
S1E23.des: As Carol goes into labor; Ross and Susan argue, Rachel flirts with Carol's doctor, and Joey assists a pregnant single mother.

S1E24.title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
S1E24.des: As Ross leaves for China, Chandler accidentally reveals Ross's feelings for Rachel. Joey takes part in a fertility study and is unable to sleep with his new girlfriend.
